name.description: Corresponding snapshot id, which is the same as jobExecutionId

description.description: Represents relations with another matched records, necessary for saving the history of applying changes for inventory/holding/etc records

setSpec.description: Generation from the last record with the same matchedId incremented by 1. Starts from 0.

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record
